scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules api/node_modules frontend/dist backend/dist
